text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Valorant. The build quality of the Eluktronics N950KP6 Premium VR Ready Gaming Laptop - Intel G4560 Dual Core Desktop CPU 6GB GDDR5 NVIDIA GeForce 1060 GPU 15.6” 72% NTSC Full HD IPS RGB Backlit Keys 256GB SATA SSD + 8GB DDR4 RAM is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the Intel Core R5. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The trackpad is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Eluktronics N950KP6 Premium VR Ready Gaming Laptop - Intel G4560 Dual Core Desktop CPU 6GB GDDR5 NVIDIA GeForce 1060 GPU 15.6” 72% NTSC Full HD IPS RGB Backlit Keys 256GB SATA SSD + 8GB DDR4 RAM!
